name: AOGsmart
slogan: A digitised support & trading network for resolving commercial aircraft disruptions.
description:
The product is a digitized support network with the capabilities for a component, logistics and tooling resource exchange via a smart trading platform. 

It helps our customers to significantly reduce the downtime of their aircraft which only make money when they are flying. Its a colossal loss to an airline when their aircraft aren't making money and in a $90bn industry this level of efficiency delivers over 30% savings to their running costs.

Our customers are all the airlines, OEMs, Maintenance, Overhaul and Repair organizations, part suppliers and brokers.

jobs.title: CTO
jobs.description:
AOGsmart will offer exciting challenges with AI and deep learning technologies that are only just being adopted by the aviation industry. 
You will have the opportunity to be a part of unique offering that will be the talk of the aviation industry, we will be creating some very special applications that aim to disrupt current practices and will deliver exponential efficiencies. You will be amongst inspired and dedicated visionaries who will work tirelessly to reach high levels of performance in order to own the market for years to come.

AOGsmart is a visionary company that will be impacting the heart of the aviation sector and will be delivering significant savings, convenience and a smarter service to the entire aviation community.

We are looking for a senior stack developer who would graduate into the role of a CTO to drive production and key development, with a hands-on approach and the ability to lead a team of internal and external teams;

Build the agile technology environment to deliver the app to market.

Design a technology roadmap to support a 2-3 year active rollout of functionality.

Develop and implement a lean internal staffing model.

Develop an appropriate plan for cost- and time-effective use of outsourcing partners and internal hires.

Define appropriate IT, data protection and security policies, and ensure full compliance with FCA data management requirements as a payment provider.

Relevant experience includes the successful development and launch of at least one mobile app.

In-depth knowledge of all aspects of the software development life cycle (SDLC), best practices and agile software development.

Broad understanding of web, app programming, systems design, and systems architecture.
